::Liono::

Motormaster's knee hits Liono in the stomach, the sound of crushing 
circuits clearly audible, and his hands wrap around Liono's neck. The 
Maximal clenches his teeth, bringing his sword back and then stabbing 
it at Motormaster's side.




--- In nbwrpg@y..., Robert Dahl <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> Motormaster takes the slash again, this time it digs deep into his 
armor,
> "Why you rotten little" he shouts in rage, as he drops his sword 
and tries
> to rap his hands around the Maximals throat, at the same time 
Bringing a
> knee up towards his opponent.
